Question: On February 11, 2007, newspaper photographs were published showing this person lying clothed in bed in an embrace with Gibson.
Hints: This person was chosen to be the 1993 Playmate of the Year.
Natalie Maullin said she met this person in April 2006 in Cedars-Sinai Medical Centre.
On June 27, 1994, this person, 26, and Marshall, 89, married in Houston.
